jump_scares.spoiler: An infected slams onto the window of the kitchen door
Another infected slams onto the kitchen door
An infected’s arm breaks through the window
A woman appears screaming for help
An infected guest suddenly lunges at Koldo from within the police car
An infected’s arm breaks through the door
An infected reaches through the window and kills one of the characters
An infected suddenly runs out in front of Clara
The Medeiros girl from the first two films appears in the TV screen’s reflection behind Koldo

As the light flickers on, an infected appears behind the glass window
The same infected bursts through the window and attacks Natalie
An infected appears in the kitchen door window
An infected attacks Clara
Sophia rips the bedroom curtains open while touring the house
Sophia is startled in the parking lot observing a woman and her baby
Joseph angrily throws a tub of water on Sophia to wake her up
While conjuring spirits, Sophia sees a dark shape smoking a cigarette shifting in the char across from her
A demon hand grabs Sophia and forces her into the basement
The bat creature comes alive and bites Tomaz
Magda is grabbed from behind
Magda is stabbed through the hole
After holding the map up to the car window, Lorraine suddenly moves it away. The sudden noise and movement accompanied by the tension of the scene may startle some people
As Lorraine looks into the rear view mirror during a tense scene, the car horn suddenly blares
As Ed says “that should do it” and lowers the bonnet, Lorraine sees a group of ghosts standing behind him, seconds later one of the ghosts pushes Ed to the ground
A truck suddenly appears out of the fog and almost runs Ed over
A box on the shelf suddenly closes startling Daniela
As Daniela approaches the empty rocking chair, the door suddenly slams closed
As the camera pans across to Daniela, we see the disfigured face of her father beside her and he screams “you did this to me!”
As the door to the chicken coup closes, we here loud snarling noises from the dog outside
As Mary Ellen holds the silver coin up, the Ferryman suddenly appears in front of her
Judy is suddenly pulled towards the end of the bed
Accompanied by a sound effect, Judy is pulled back once again
Judy looks under the bed sheets and sees Annabelle, suddenly a girl jumps out of the sheets ad attacks Judy
After seeing the shadow of the demon on her wall, the demon suddenly appears beside Judy
After Judy escapes the bedroom and reunites with Mary Ellen, the door is pushed open and we hear a demonic roar
As Daniela says “everything”, all the objects in the room suddenly turn on at once
The bride suddenly grabs Daniela around the neck
One of the windows in the car breaks startling Judy
The dog suddenly jumps on the roof of the car
The Mary Ellen doppelganger holding Annabelle suddenly screams
As Judy attempts to put Annabelle back in her case, the door shuts and Judy turns around to see the demon right behind her
Blood splatters on the neighbors’ wall
John runs out of the neighbors house
An unseen force pulls Mia towards the fire
The curtain suddenly blows into Mia’s face and she falls to the ground, a few seconds later a young girl runs past her
A young girl runs at Mia and becomes a full grown adult as she barges through the door
Mia looks in a baby pram and a black hand grabs her wrist
A black figure is lying at the bottom of the staircase and its face flashes on the screen
As Mia looks under the door at her baby, Annabelle’s face pops up under the other side of the door
An unseen force blows Father Perez back as he goes to enter the church
Father Perez knocks on Mia’s door with his back facing away from it. Mia opens the door and the father shouts “May god have mercy on your soul!”
A black figure jumps down from the ceiling of the house
Jackson turns his head to reveal some blood
The boy appears at the back door
The boy runs across the living room
Sarah notices the strangled man on the floor
The detective walks back into the room and shoots herself
The detective opens her eyes and there is a loud drum sound
The handyman slams into the side window of the car
After Scarlett puts down the phone, a man’s voice starts talking from behind the group
Mole, the presumed dead friend of one of the group members, jumps at the group when approached by Souxie. [Video]
The ghost jumps again when further approached
Benji gets attacked by a lady
A sculpture on the wall breaks off and attacks the group
A hand reaches out of the water and grabs Scarlett
Scarlett lifts the sack on a hanging person’s head when that person jumps at her. [Video]

movies.title: Antrum: The Deadliest Film Ever Made.

movies.title: Errementari: The Blacksmith and the Devil

A blanket is lifted to reveal a severed head

As they touch the woman she reanimates as a demon and the music comes in very loudly
Jessica yells now as a demon
